willkommensText:
Welcome to the Worry-Free Digital Quiz App . This is a completely free app that allows you to playfully test and improve your knowledge of topics related to IT and digitalisation. Would you like more information about the topics in the quizzes? Visit our website to find out more: www.sorgenfrei-digital.com 
 Have fun!
